A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Missing the beautiful landscapes\, the surprising inspiring stories. Feels like number 7\, even less exciting. Far too predictable plot\, borderline boring heroes...  disappointed. Of course much better than episodes I\, II and III and still worth seeing even just for the curiosity of it or for some few special effects\, besides the super weird Flying Leia.\n\nMissing whoever did \"Rogue One\" which was so well done.
